Class SimpleSearchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.synovite.mvctest.search.SimpleSearchManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchManager

    @Component
public class SimpleSearchManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchManager
    Concrete implementation of SearchManager interface that takes a SolrDataDAO object as autowired bean to communicate with a server
